recipe.title: Strawberry Icebox Cake
recipe.ingredients: 3 pints fresh strawberries -- sliced 1 1/2 cups heavy cream -- whipped 3/4 cup very soft butter 2 cups vanilla wafers -- ground into crumbs 1 1/2 teaspoons vanilla 3 cups powdered sugar 1 egg
recipe.steps: Cream butter and sugar; add beaten egg and 1 teaspoon vanilla; consistency should be pourable but not watery. Add powdered sugar and beat. Put 1/2 the wafer crumbs on bottom of 9 inch springform pan. Whip cream with 1/2 teaspoon vanilla. Pour 1/2 of the butter mixture over crumbs. Add 1/2 the berries, then 1/2 the cream. Repeat all layers. Sprinkle reserved crumbs on top. Put in freezer for 1 hour. (At least!) Garnish each serving with a whole berry.
